docs.snippet: At his press conferences in the Oval Room at the White House President Truman's manner is affable and courteous. The President chats with reporters crowded in front of his desk until all the correspondents -- well over 120 usually attend a conference...
docs.lead_paragraph: At his press conferences in the Oval Room at the White House President Truman's manner is affable and courteous. The President chats with reporters crowded in front of his desk until all the correspondents -- well over 120 usually attend a conference -- have filed into the room.

docs.snippet: Millions of the dollars that Great Britain needs desperately now are being siphoned off to other nations in three-way import deals for British merchandise, experts in foreign exchange conceded yesterday.

headline.main: IMPORT TRANSFERS CRITICAL TO BRITAIN; 3-Way Deals by Traders Hurt Nation's Dollar Balance -- Way Sought to Stop Them

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 19 -- Argentine relations with Uruguay remain touchy and are likely to get more rather than less so, in the opinion of the best diplomatic observers.

headline.main: URUGUAY UNEASY ABOUT ARGENTINA; New Incidents In Montevideo Continue to Aggravate Ties With Buenos Aires

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July .1 -- The investigation of the Argentine Institute for the Promotion of Trade, the Peron trade monopoly, which the opposition in Congress had been demanding for a full month, was turned over last night to the judicial authorities.
